page.title: 08MILTON VILLAGE SCHOOL.
page.content: The 28 Milton of Balgonie children, aged 5_12,get their education at the village school.Begun in 1823,our school now has a double room,a single room and a dining hall where we have TV and gym. Mrs Walker,headteacher, teaches 8 9_12 year olds,and Mrs Winn the 5_8 year olds.Our{curriculum } includes maths,language,geography, history or science projects, gym,art, craft,music and drama.For craft we are learning drawn thread work.Everyone plays musical instruments and sings at the concerts we give throughout the year.Our{resources,}similar to the big schools,include a computer,video,film and slide projectors,TV,a camera,radio cassette recorders and a listening centre.Each day we have{'after_school' clubs_science,computer,recorder,chess and gym.Some of us have gymnastic awards and science badges.
